ingredients3001.name: Crystal Malt 10°
ingredients3001.description: Sweet, mild caramel flavor and a golden color. Use in light lagers and light ales.

ingredients3002.name: Crystal Malt 20°
ingredients3002.description: Sweet, mild caramel flavor and a golden color. Use in light lagers and light ales.

ingredients3003.name: Crystal Malt 30°
ingredients3003.description: Sweet, mild caramel flavor and a golden color. Use in light lagers and light ales.

ingredients3004.name: Crystal Malt 40°
ingredients3004.description: Sweet, mild caramel flavor and a golden color. Use in light lagers and light ales.

ingredients3005.name: Crystal Malt 60°
ingredients3005.description: Sweet caramel flavor, deep golden to red color. For dark amber and brown ales.

ingredients3006.name: Crystal Malt 80°
ingredients3006.description: Sweet, smooth caramel flavor and a red to deep red color. For porters, old ales.

ingredients3007.name: Crystal Malt 90°
ingredients3007.description: Pronounced caramel flavor and a red color. For stouts, porters and black beers.

ingredients3008.name: Crystal Malt 120°
ingredients3008.description: Pronounced caramel flavor and a red color. For stouts, porters and black beers.

ingredients3009.name: Black Patent Malt
ingredients3009.description: Provides color and sharp flavor in stouts and porters.

ingredients3010.name: Roasted Barley
ingredients3010.description: Sweet, grainy, coffee flavor and a red to deep brown color. For porters and stouts.

ingredients3011.name: Black Barley
ingredients3011.description: Imparts dryness. Unmalted; use in porters and dry stouts.

ingredients3012.name: Chocolate Malt
ingredients3012.description: Use in all types to adjust color and add nutty, toasted flavor. Chocolate flavor.

ingredients3013.name: Dextrin Malt (carapils)
ingredients3013.description: Balances body and flavor without adding color, aids in head retention. For any beer.

ingredients3014.name: 2-row Pale Malt
ingredients3014.description: Smooth, less grainy, moderate malt flavor. Basic malt for all beer styles.

ingredients3015.name: 6-row Pale Malt
ingredients3015.description: Moderate malt flavor. Basic malt for all beer styles.

ingredients3016.name: Munich Malt
ingredients3016.description: Sweet, toasted flavor and aroma. For Oktoberfests and malty styles.

ingredients3017.name: Special Roast
ingredients3017.description: Provides a deep golden to brown color for ales. Use in all darker ales.

ingredients3018.name: Vienna Malt
ingredients3018.description: Increases malty flavor, provides balance. Use in Vienna, Märzen and Oktoberfest.

ingredients3019.name: Victory Malt
ingredients3019.description: Provides a deep golden to brown color. Use in nut brown ales, IPAs and Scottish ales.

ingredients3020.name: Wheat Malt
ingredients3020.description: Light flavor and creamy head. For American weizenbier, weissbier and dunkelweiss.

ingredients3021.name: White Wheat Malt
ingredients3021.description: Imparts a malty flavor. For American wheat beers, wheat bock and doppel bock.
